title: Stalin's Curse: Battling for Communism in War and Cold War

Stalin's Curse - Battling for Communism in War and Cold War (2013) by Robert Gellately.pdf

Author of several histories of German and Russian totalitarianism, Gellately here indicts Stalin as the primary instigator of the Cold War, marshaling evidence from Communist archives that undermines the revisionist case for Western responsibility for starting the confrontation.
